************************************************************
Detected symmetry of structure = cubic 

Criteria for mechanical stability of cubic structures : 

conditon 1 = c11-c12>0

conditon 2 = c11+2c12>0

conditon 3 = c44>0

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
condition 1 constraint:	  met
condition 2 constraint:	 met
condition 3 constraint:	 met
